All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
City
Represents a city entity in the system.
CityDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling database operations related to cities.
CityHandler
The CityHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to city records.
Country
Represents a country in the system.
CountryDAO
Data Access Object for managing country data in the database.
CountryHandler
The CountryHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to country records.
DatabaseConnection
Provides a method to establish a connection to the database using the database configuration properties.
Department
Represents a department within the organization.
DepartmentDAO
Data Access Object for managing department data in the database.
DepartmentHandler
The DepartmentHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to department records.
Employee
Represents an employee in the system.
EmployeeDAO
Data Access Object for managing employee data in the database.
EmployeeHandler
The EmployeeHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to employee records.
Historic
Represents a historical record of an employee's career events in the system.
HistoricDAO
Data Access Object for managing historic records in the database.
HistoricHandler
The HistoricHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to historic records.
Job
Represents a job position within the organization.
JobDAO
Data Access Object for managing job records in the database.
JobHandler
The JobHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to job records.
Location
Represents a physical location, typically associated with an address in a city.
LocationDAO
Data Access Object for managing location records in the database.
LocationHandler
The LocationHandler class is responsible for processing requests related to location records.
Server
The Server class is responsible for initializing and running the server application.
